thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au
thread.title: Jill

author: Jill
title: Jill
text:
Great service, I love that it's so fast (I received the card within days and it was of the highest quality) and the person who helped me via email was FANTASTIC.
I did find it really hard to use the program online however and it took a lot longer to design the card than I think it should have! I suggested to the person I spoke to that you look at Shutterfly (based out of the US) as a model as their online design program is fantastic and so easy to use. Yours was so hard that it may prevent me from using it again.
It would also be great if it was possible to just order 1 card, instead of the minimum of 10 in the future.
